title: Fix runtime dependency placement and remove unused root deps
description: Move required runtime packages from devDependencies to dependencies in packages/core/package.json, remove unused root-level dependencies from package.json after verifying they are not referenced, and run build/test to confirm.
acceptanceCriteria: Runtime packages required at runtime are present under dependencies in packages/core/package.json; removed root dependencies do not break build or tests (repo builds/tests pass). Changes validated by running yarn build and yarn test locally or CI.
